title.narrative: FIELDLEVELOPERATIONSSUPPORT TO PEACEBLDG

description.narrative: During 2017 and 2018, effective and efficient field level operational management support to peace-building programmes in Mindanao, which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, capacity of transitional actors (state/non-state) to design and deliver key services for children in conflict-affected areas is strengthened.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: During 2017 and 2018, effective and efficient field level operational management support to peace-building programmes in Mindanao

description.narrative: Effective and efficient field level operational support to peacebuilding programmes achieved in 2018. This included compliance with security risk management measures SRM-M, road safety and advanced driver skills, ICT support including ICT4D initiatives, and partnership administration including HACT. | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/01/2019

title.narrative: UNICEF Mindanao Field Office continue to be MOSS Compliant (to include UNICEF Warehouse based in Cotabato) including fleet management

actual.value: 2018:All complete. MOSS is replaced with SRMM. UNICEF is fully compliant

title.narrative: Full IT connectivity with no major interruptions

actual.value:
